commentBody: 20 years ago I anguished over sending my son to the the local parochial school knowing school spirit and football mean all boys must play the game unless their parents where doctors or headed the robot club. Being neither we allowed him to play and his limited local success lead to more limited success in high school.   From my perspective more damage is being caused by youth football than any other activity.  Dump the sport from the educational sector and seek safer ways of having fun.
